mapper.select: select a.*, b.* from lad_rev_order a LEFT JOIN sys_status b ON a.order_statusid = b.status_id where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select a.*, b.* from lad_rev_order a LEFT JOIN sys_status b ON a.order_statusid = b.status_id where order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into lad_rev_order (order_id, order_no, order_datetime, order_statusid, order_userid, order_hometime, order_addressid, order_addressprovince, order_addresscity, order_addresscounty, order_addressstreet, order_addressconsignee, order_addressmobile, order_deleted) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderStatusid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderUserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderHometime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAddressid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAddressprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAddresscity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAddresscounty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAddressstreet,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAddressconsignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAddressmobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER})
